00089 template <Size N>
00090 class Vector {
00091  protected:
00092   float *m_Data;
00093  public:
00094   Vector( void ) {
00095     m_Data = new float[ N ];
00096     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00097       m_Data[ i ] = 0.0;
00098   }
00099   Vector( const Vector& v ) {
00100     m_Data = new float[ N ];
00101     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00102       m_Data[ i ] = v.m_Data[ i ];
00103   }
00104   ~Vector() {
00105     delete[] m_Data;
00106   }
00107 
00108   inline float& operator() ( Identifier i ) const {
00109     return m_Data[ i ];
00110   }
00111 
00112   inline Vector& operator=( const Vector& b ) {
00113     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00114       m_Data[ i ] = b.m_Data[ i ];
00115     return *this;
00116   }
00117   inline Vector& operator=( const float& x ) {
00118     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00119       m_Data[ i ] = x;
00120     return *this;
00121   }
00122   inline Vector& operator-( void ) {
00123     Vector<N> temp;
00124     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00125       temp.m_Data[ i ] = -m_Data[ i ];
00126     return temp;
00127   }
00128   inline Vector operator+( const Vector& x ) const {
00129     Vector<N> temp;
00130     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00131       temp.m_Data[ i ] = m_Data[ i ] + x.m_Data[ i ];
00132     return temp;
00133   }
00134   inline Vector operator-( const Vector& x ) const {
00135     Vector<N> temp;
00136     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00137       temp.m_Data[ i ] = m_Data[ i ] - x.m_Data[ i ];
00138     return temp;
00139   }
00140   inline Vector operator*( const float& x ) {
00141     Vector<N> temp;
00142     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00143       temp.m_Data[ i ] = m_Data[ i ] * x;
00144     return temp;
00145   }
00146   inline Vector operator/( const float& x ) {
00147     Vector<N> temp;
00148     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00149       temp.m_Data[ i ] = m_Data[ i ] / x;
00150     return temp;
00151   }
00152   inline Vector& operator+=( const Vector& x ) {
00153     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00154       m_Data[ i ] += x.m_Data[ i ];
00155     return *this;
00156   }
00157   inline Vector& operator-=( const Vector& x ) {
00158     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00159       m_Data[ i ] -= x.m_Data[ i ];
00160     return *this;
00161   }
00162   inline Vector& operator*=( const float& x ) {
00163     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00164       m_Data[ i ] *= x;
00165     return *this;
00166   }
00167   inline Vector& operator/=( const float& x ) {
00168     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00169       m_Data[ i ] /= x;
00170     return *this;
00171   }
00172   inline float& operator() ( const Identifier i ) {
00173     return m_Data[ i ];
00174   }
00175   // dot product
00176   inline float operator*( const Vector& vb ) const {
00177     float res = 0;
00178     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < N; i++ )
00179       res += m_Data[ i ] * vb.m_Data[ i ];
00180     return res;
00181   }
00182   // cross product
00183   inline Vector operator^( const Vector& vb ) const {
00184     Vector<N> temp;
00185     if ( N != 3 )
00186       throw CrossProductWrongDimension();
00187     temp.m_Data[ 0 ] = m_Data[ 1 ] * vb.m_Data[ 2 ] - m_Data[ 2 ] * vb.m_Data[ 1 ];
00188     temp.m_Data[ 1 ] = m_Data[ 2 ] * vb.m_Data[ 0 ] - m_Data[ 0 ] * vb.m_Data[ 2 ];
00189     temp.m_Data[ 2 ] = m_Data[ 0 ] * vb.m_Data[ 1 ] - m_Data[ 1 ] * vb.m_Data[ 0 ];
00190 
00191     return temp;
00192   }
00193   inline float norm( void ) const {
00194     return sqrt( ( *this ) * ( *this ) );
00195   }
00196   inline float sqnorm( void ) const {
00197     return ( *this ) * ( *this );
00198   }
00199 
00200   inline Vector& normalize( void ) {
00201     *this /= norm();
00202     return *this;
00203   }
00204 };

00206 template <Size nr, Size nc>
00207   class Matrix {
00208   protected:
00209   double *m_Data;
00210   public:
00211   Matrix() {
00212     m_Data = new double[ nr * nc ];
00213   }
00214   Matrix( const Matrix& m ) {
00215     m_Data = new double[ nr * nc ];
00216     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < nr*nc; i++ )
00217       m_Data[ i ] = m.m_Data[ i ];
00218   }
00219   ~Matrix() {
00220     delete[] m_Data;
00221   }
00222 
00223   inline double& operator() ( Identifier row, Identifier col ) {
00224     return m_Data[ col + row * nc ];
00225   }
00226 
00227   inline double& operator() ( Identifier row, Identifier col ) const {
00228     return m_Data[ col + row * nc ];
00229   }
00230 
00231   inline Matrix& operator= ( Matrix const &M ) {
00232     Identifier i;
00233     for ( i = 0;i < nr*nc;i++ )
00234       m_Data[ i ] = M.m_Data[ i ];
00235     return *this;
00236   }
00237 
00238   inline Matrix& operator= ( const double& x ) {
00239     Identifier i;
00240     for ( i = 0;i < nr*nc;i++ )
00241       m_Data[ i ] = x;
00242     return *this;
00243   }
00244 
00245   inline Vector<nr> operator[] ( Identifier col ) const {
00246     Vector <nr> v;
00247     for ( Identifier i = 0;i < nr;++i )
00248       v( i ) = m_Data[ col + i * nc ];
00249     return v;
00250   }
00251 
00252   inline Matrix& operator+=( const Matrix& m ) {
00253     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < nr*nc; i++ )
00254       m_Data[ i ] += m.m_Data[ i ];
00255     return *this;
00256   }
00257 
00258   inline Matrix& operator-=( const Matrix& m ) {
00259     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < nr*nc; i++ )
00260       m_Data[ i ] -= m.m_Data[ i ];
00261     return *this;
00262   }
00263 
00264   inline Matrix operator*( const float& x ) {
00265     Matrix<nr, nc> temp;
00266     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < nr*nc; i++ )
00267       temp.m_Data[ i ] = m_Data[ i ] * x;
00268     return temp;
00269   }
00270 
00271   inline Matrix operator/( const float& x ) {
00272     Matrix<nr, nc> temp;
00273     float ix = 1.0 / x;
00274     for ( Identifier i = 0; i < nr*nc; i++ )
00275       temp.m_Data[ i ] = m_Data[ i ] * ix;
00276     return temp;
00277   }
00278 
00279   inline void set_diag( const Vector<nc>& diag ) {
00280     *this = 0.0;
00281     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nc; ++i ) {
00282       ( *this ) ( i, i ) = diag( i );
00283     }
00284   }
00285 
00286   void Jacobi( Vector<nr>& lambda, Matrix<nr, nr>& V, int &nrot ) const;
00287 
00288   void Eigen( Vector<nr>& lambda, Matrix<nr, nr>& V ) const {
00289     gsl_matrix_view m = gsl_matrix_view_array( m_Data, nr, nr );
00290     gsl_vector *eval = gsl_vector_alloc ( nr );
00291     gsl_matrix *evec = gsl_matrix_alloc ( nr, nr );
00292 
00293     gsl_eigen_symmv_workspace * w = gsl_eigen_symmv_alloc ( nr );
00294 
00295     gsl_eigen_symmv ( &m.matrix, eval, evec, w );
00296     gsl_eigen_symmv_free ( w );
00297     gsl_eigen_symmv_sort ( eval, evec, GSL_EIGEN_SORT_ABS_ASC );
00298 
00299     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nr; ++i ) {
00300       //double eval_i = gsl_vector_get (eval, i);
00301       //gsl_vector_view evec_i = gsl_matrix_column (evec, i);
00302 
00303       lambda( i ) = gsl_vector_get ( eval, i );
00304       for ( unsigned j = 0; j < nr; ++j )
00305         V( i, j ) = gsl_matrix_get( evec, i, j );
00306     }
00307   }
00308 
00309 }
00310 ;
00311 
00312 #define ROTATE(a,i,j,k,l) g=(a)(i,j);h=(a)(k,l);(a)(i,j)=g-s*(h+g*tau);\
00313         (a)(k,l)=h+s*(g-h*tau);
00314 
00315 template <Size nr, Size nc>
00316   void 
00317   Matrix<nr, nc>::Jacobi( Vector<nr>& lambda, Matrix<nr, nr>& V, int &nrot ) const {
00318   int n = nr;
00319   int j, iq, ip, i;
00320   double tresh, theta, tau, t, sm, s, h, g, c;
00321   double *b = new double[ n ],
00322     *z = new double[ n ];
00323 
00324   if ( nr != nc ) {
00325     std::cerr << "Error : Matrix must be square in Matrix::Jacobi!" << std::endl;
00326     return ;
00327   }
00328 
00329   //... set output matrix to identity matrix ...
00330   for ( ip = 0; ip < n; ip++ ) {
00331     for ( iq = 0; iq < n; iq++ )
00332       V( ip, iq ) = 0.0;
00333     V( ip, ip ) = 1.0;
00334   }
00335 
00336   for ( ip = 0; ip < n; ip++ ) {
00337     b[ ip ] = lambda( ip ) = ( *this ) ( ip, ip );
00338     z[ ip ] = 0.0;
00339   }
00340   nrot = 0;
00341   for ( i = 0; i < 50;i++ ) {
00342     sm = 0.0;
00343     for ( ip = 0; ip < n - 1;ip++ ) {
00344       for ( iq = ip + 1;iq < n;iq++ )
00345         sm += fabs( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) );
00346     }
00347     if ( sm == 0.0 ) {
00348       delete[] b;
00349       delete[] z;
00350       return ;
00351     }
00352     if ( i < 4 )
00353       tresh = 0.2 * sm / ( n * n );
00354     else
00355       tresh = 0.0;
00356     for ( ip = 0; ip < n - 1; ip++ ) {
00357       for ( iq = ip + 1; iq < n; iq++ ) {
00358         g = 100.0 * fabs( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) );
00359         if ( i > 4 && ( float ) ( fabs( lambda( ip ) ) + g ) == ( float ) fabs( lambda( ip ) )
00360              && ( float ) ( fabs( lambda( iq ) ) + g ) == ( float ) fabs( lambda( iq ) ) )
00361           ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) = 0.0;
00362         else if ( fabs( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) ) > tresh ) {
00363           h = lambda( iq ) - lambda( ip );
00364           if ( ( float ) ( fabs( h ) + g ) == ( float ) fabs( h ) )
00365             t = ( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) ) / h;
00366           else {
00367             theta = 0.5 * h / ( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) );
00368             t = 1.0 / ( fabs( theta ) + sqrt( 1.0 + theta * theta ) );
00369             if ( theta < 0.0 )
00370               t = -t;
00371           }
00372           c = 1.0 / sqrt( 1 + t * t );
00373           s = t * c;
00374           tau = s / ( 1.0 + c );
00375           h = t * ( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) );
00376           z[ ip ] -= h;
00377           z[ iq ] += h;
00378           lambda( ip ) -= h;
00379           lambda( iq ) += h;
00380           ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) = 0.0;
00381           for ( j = 0; j < ip - 1;j++ ) {
00382             ROTATE( *this, j, ip, j, iq );
00383           }
00384           for ( j = ip + 1;j <= iq - 1;j++ ) {
00385             ROTATE( *this, ip, j, j, iq );
00386           }
00387           for ( j = iq + 1;j < n;j++ ) {
00388             ROTATE( *this, ip, j, iq, j );
00389           }
00390           for ( j = 0;j < n;j++ ) {
00391             ROTATE( V, j, ip, j, iq );
00392           }
00393           ++nrot;
00394         }
00395       }
00396     }
00397     for ( ip = 0;ip < n;ip++ ) {
00398       b[ ip ] += z[ ip ];
00399       lambda( ip ) = b[ ip ];
00400       z[ ip ] = 0.0;
00401     }
00402   }
00403   std::cerr << "Error : Too many iterations in routine Jacobi!" << std::endl;
00404   delete[] b;
00405   delete[] z;
00406 }

00489     if ( MPI::COMM_WORLD.Get_rank() == 0 ) {
00490       if ( m_Debuglevel <= m_SystemDebuglevel )
00491         std::cerr << param;

00494         std::cerr << param;
00495     }

00498       std::cerr << param;
00499 #endif
00500 
00501     return *this;
00502   }

00509     } else {
00510       if ( m_Debuglevel < 2 )
00511         std::cerr << std::endl;
00512     }
00513 #else

00525 
00526 // to compute the distance of two points on a 3-torus, we calculate
00527 // the distance in two coordinate systems, the original one and one
00528 // rotated by pi on the torus and take the minimal distance from both
00529 // coordinate systems.
00530 // returns the square of the distance
00531 
00532 inline float 
00533 mod( float a, float b ) {
00534   if ( a >= b )
00535     return a -b;
00536   if ( a < 0 )
00537     return a + b;
00538   return a;
00539 }

00547   float b2 = Boxlength*0.5;
00548         
00549   d1x = (x2 - x1);
00550   d1y = (y2 - y1);

00554   d2y = ( mod(y2+b2,Boxlength) - mod(y1+b2,Boxlength) );        
00555   d2z = ( mod(z2+b2,Boxlength) - mod(z1+b2,Boxlength) );
00556

00558   else  rv(0) = d2x;

00571 inline float 
00572 PeriodicDistance2( float x1, float y1, float z1, float x2, float y2, float z2, float Boxlength, Vector<3> &rv ) {
00573   /*float d1x, d1y, d1z, d2x, d2y, d2z;
00574     float b2 = Boxlength*0.5;
00575 
00576     d1x = (x1 - x2);
00577     d1y = (y1 - y2);
00578     d1z = (z1 - z2);
00579 
00580     d2x = ( mod(x1+b2,Boxlength) - mod(x2+b2,Boxlength) );
00581     d2y = ( mod(y1+b2,Boxlength) - mod(y2+b2,Boxlength) );      
00582     d2z = ( mod(z1+b2,Boxlength) - mod(z2+b2,Boxlength) );
00583 
00584     if( fabs(d1x)<fabs(d2x) )   rv(0) = d1x;
00585     else        rv(0) = d2x;
00586 
00587     if( fabs(d1y)<fabs(d2y) )   rv(1) = d1y;
00588     else        rv(1) = d2y;
00589 
00590     if( fabs(d1z)<fabs(d2z) )   rv(2) = d1z;
00591     else        rv(2) = d2z;
00592 
00593 
00594     return rv(0)*rv(0)+rv(1)*rv(1)+rv(2)*rv(2);*/
00595 
00596   float dx, dy, dz;
00597   float Boxlength05 = 0.5 * Boxlength;
00598 
00599   dx = x2 - x1;
00600   dy = y2 - y1;
00601   dz = z2 - z1;
00602 
00603   if ( dx > Boxlength05 )
00604     dx -= Boxlength;
00605   if ( dx <= -Boxlength05 )
00606     dx += Boxlength;
00607 
00608   if ( dy > Boxlength05 )
00609     dy -= Boxlength;
00610   if ( dy <= -Boxlength05 )
00611     dy += Boxlength;
00612 
00613   if ( dz > Boxlength05 )
00614     dz -= Boxlength;
00615   if ( dz <= -Boxlength05 )
00616     dz += Boxlength;
00617 
00618   rv( 0 ) = dx;
00619   rv( 1 ) = dy;
00620   rv( 2 ) = dz;
00621 
00622   return dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz;
00623 }
00624 
00625 
00626 inline float 
00627 PeriodicDistance2( Vector<3> x, Vector<3> y, float Boxlength, Vector<3> &rv ) {
00628   return PeriodicDistance2( x( 0 ), x( 1 ), x( 2 ), y( 0 ), y( 1 ), y( 2 ), Boxlength, rv );
00629 }

00675 
00676 // compute the distance between two points on a euclidean 3-torus
00677 // returns the correct (unsquared) distance ....
00678 inline float 
00679 PeriodicDistance( float x1, float y1, float z1, float x2, float y2, float z2, float Boxlength, Vector<3> &rv ) {
00680   return sqrt( PeriodicDistance2( x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2, Boxlength, rv ) );
00681 }
00682 
00683 inline float 
00684 PeriodicDistance( Vector<3> x, Vector<3> y, float Boxlength, Vector<3> &rv ) {
00685   return sqrt( PeriodicDistance2( x( 0 ), x( 1 ), x( 2 ), y( 0 ), y( 1 ), y( 2 ), Boxlength, rv ) );
00686 }
00687 
00688 
00689 inline Vector<3> 
00690 MinDistCoord( Vector<3> x1, Vector<3> x2, Vector<3> y, float Boxlength ) {
00691   Vector<3> vv, r;
00692   float d1, d2;
00693   Matrix<3, 3> M1, M2, My;
00694 
00695   M1.set_diag( x1 );
00696   M2.set_diag( x2 );
00697   My.set_diag( y );
00698 
00699   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i ) {
00700     d1 = PeriodicDistance( M1[ i ], My[ i ], Boxlength, vv );
00701     d2 = PeriodicDistance( M2[ i ], My[ i ], Boxlength, vv );
00702 
00703     if ( d1 < d2 )
00704       r( i ) = M1( i, i );
00705     else
00706       r( i ) = M2( i, i );
00707   }
00708   return r;
00709 }
